metadata.name: Ride The Lightning | Metalverse
metadata.description:
Like a thundering riff that shakes the soul, this electrifying art piece unites the raw power of heavy rock with hypnotic motion graphics. A skull, the universal symbol of mortality, serves as the canvas for a mesmerizing display of pulsing colors and mesmerizing animations. With every kick drum, the skull comes to life, a fiery reminder that even in death, there is beauty and power to be found.

Named after one of my favorite Metallica albums.

Listen sound on ðŸ”Š

The Metalverse collection brings everything I have been working on for many years into a singular art form where both music and visuals work together as the parts of a song would work together. It's not simply 'audio reactive', and the visuals are not just 'scored to' the music - instead, both mediums are playing off each other, as extensions of the creative process.
